display.title: Kovac's Hoard - Low Tier
display.description: Kovac hoards many of the Nexus resources locked away in his house. The others thought it would be funny to replicate his keys and discard them all over the Nexus. The low tier chests are located in the alcove at back of the first floor. Be careful any attempt to use the key will cause it to crumble so make sure it's the correct chest
